Welcome to Jie Liu’s Personal site !!!

Hello , I am Jie Liu , who comes from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. This is the 2nd year of my master degree in Software Engineering . I like travelling、 running and playing the guitar, but without bells and whistles, I am just a rookie in these fields.

Motto: When you are alone, please see the spaces between your fingers, and remember that is where my fingers fit perfectly.

My interest is about:

  • machine learning : Scikit Learn / XGBoost / LightGBM
  • deep learning : Keras / Caffe / Tensorflow
  • recommender system : Collaborative Filtering
  • computrer vision : Segmentation / Classification / Detection

Education:

  • 2012-2016 Hunan University (major in The Internet of Things)
    • which I think is the best University in the world !
  • 2016-2019 Shanghai Jiao Tong University (major in Software Engineering)
    • It makes me believe that life is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experienced.

Intern Experience:

  • 2016.03-2016.08 BIM Research Center of SJTU (C++ Developer)
  • 2016.07-2016.12 Hailiao Technology (Android/Linux Developer, A very good experience with so talented entrepreneurs)
  • 2017.08-2018.12 Intel (Asia) Deep learning Lab (Computer Vision, Segmentation, Research assistant)
